sentences.sContent: The paper’s leading article (=  the main article  ) described the government as weak.
Article 1 of the constitution guarantees freedom of religion.
sentences.sCn: 宪法的第一条保障宗教信仰自由。

sentences.sContent: ...the article says innovative ideas alone do not ensure success...
...The article says many people tend to assume that innovation just means creating something new...
...The article cites the global giant Procter & Gamble as an example...

synos.tran: 文章；物品；[法]条款；[语]冠词

phrases.pCn: 根据契约当学徒，依雇用契约工作着
特写；专题文章；深度文章
一件复一件 articles(或 objects) of virtu 艺术珍品,古玩,古董

words.tran: 合同雇用培训的；（学徒）受契约约束的
使受协议条款的约束；指控（article的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a piece of writing about a particular subject in a newspaper or magazine
